author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Shower curb tile tips…I had to set the curb top first on this project due to time constraints. No problem. I used the contour gauge and IQ saw to make these cuts to within 1/16” of the floor, solid top and Schluter curb. Yes, the notch isn’t ideal BUT the tile layout was done to avoid slivers at the shower niche. It just is what it is 🔥#tileshower #bathroomremodel #homerenovation #homerepairtutor
title: Shower Curb Tile Tips - #shorts #tileshower #homerepairtutor
